"Confirm Your Fashion":
"Here, you can view how other people see your registered fashion, check your View count, and see how many people have sent you a \"Like!\".

・Player ID name and character name
・Race and sex
・Registered genre
・Tags
・Your comment

You can also check fashion information, such as your costume, accessories and how your registered fashion looks."

"■View count
・This is the number of times other players have looked at your fashion information.

■Like!
This is the number of times other players have sent you a Like!
Like!, Cute!,
Cool!, Funny!
Displays the number of each kind of the 4 kinds of Like! you have received.

※Both monthly and lifetime totals are displayed.
Monthly View and Like! counts are reset every month.
